item.title: Equality
item.description: Equality # Everyone Deserves to Leave the Lot with a High Quality Car. # Evidence: Low Floor, High Ceiling Tasks Work With SPED teacher, accomodating SPED student needs Wrong Answers Lead to Brilliance

item.title: Content Knowledge
item.description: Excellence in Content Knowledge # You Need to Know a Lot about Cars # Evidence: Inserts of Desmos Graphs Undergraduate Work

item.title: Pedagogical Knowledge
item.description: Excellence in Pedagogical Knowledge # Get This! You Need to Know How to Sell a Car # Evidence: Instructional Technology Desmos Activities ELS, Edulastic, Mastery Connect Assessments Nearpod Google for Education Certification Level 2 Instructional Strategies Notice and Wonder Which One Doesn’t Belong Explain Your Answer with Sentence Starters Estimates First Problem Solving and Conceptual Understanding Appropriate Feedback (link to Desmos Activity Building Guide) Productive Struggle Reasoning, Communication, Connections, and Representations 5 Practices to create math discussions Rehumanizing Mathematics Multiple Instructional Strategies for Equity Verbal Discussion (with class or with a peer) Written Explanation Drawing a Response Data-Driven Instruction Exit Tickets Informal Checks for Understanding (whiteboards, hands up)

item.title: Caring
item.description: Caring # Convince Yourself that Students Need the Car # Evidence: Story about homework packets. Hall Conferences that worked!
